text: Arturo Pomar Salamanca (September 1, 1931 - May 26, 2016) was a Spanish chess grandmaster (GM).. ajedrez.pastranec.netMuere Arturo Pomar He was born in Palma de Mallorca, Spain. He was a chess prodigy because he won the championship of the Balearic Islands at the age of 11 and became a master at 13.Records in Chess. Chess.com. Retrieved on 2012-11-07.Oscar Pomar â€“ Former Chess Prodigy. Chess.com (1931-09-01). Retrieved on 2012-11-07. He was Spanish Champion seven times (1946, 1950, 1957, 1958, 1959, 1962, and 1966), and Sub- Champion four times (1951, 1956, 1964, and 1969). Pomar died on May 26, 2016 in Barcelona, Spain, aged 84. ==References== ==Other websites== * Arturo Pomar biography at Chessgames.com Category:1931 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Chess grandmasters Category:Spanish sportspeople
title: Arturo Pomar
